Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Acipensin 1 (Ac1, histone-derived, natural AMPs; bony fish, animals, XXE; UCLL1; more AMPs?)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide shows 96.1% similarity toHipposin.Activity: Active against E. coli ML35p (MIC 0.7 uM), L. monocytogenes EGD (MIC 1.1 uM), MRSA ATCC 33591 (MIC 0.9 uM), and C. albicans 820 (MIC 1 uM).Toxicity: human RBC: no hemolysis till 40 uM. Updated 11/2023
Literature Information.Author: Shamova OV, Orlov DS, Balandin SV, Shramova EI, Tsvetkova EV, Panteleev PV, Leonova YF, Tagaev AA, Kokryakov VN, Ovchinnikova TV.2014
Literature Information.Title: Acipensins - Novel Antimicrobial Peptides from Leukocytes of the Russian Sturgeon Acipenser gueldenstaedtii
